meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Sameer Rai Ariana Mikulski James Holzhauer Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7967.

div.div:
James Holzhauer game 4.
James sets a new single-day cash winnings record of $110,914.

td.p: Sameer Rai, a freelancer from Los Altos, California
Ariana Mikulski, an associate teaching professor from State College, Pennsylvania
James Holzhauer, a professional sports gambler from Las Vegas, Nevada (whose 3-day cash winnings total $133,451)

tr.td: BEER
STOUT
LOGGER
PALE AIL
LIGHT
"PORTER"

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', 'In a 2019 Super Bowl ad, we learned about the corn syrup policy of Bud Light, Miller Lite & this Colorado light')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

tr.td: In a 2019 Super Bowl ad, we learned about the corn syrup policy of Bud Light, Miller Lite & this Colorado light

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', '(Alex: [After James\' wager has been revealed] A new one-day record--$110,914. And now a 4-day record of $244,365. Is it too soon to start thinking about Ken Jennings comparisons?)
ArianaWhat is a quantum leap?
$700
SameerWhat is a quantum leap?
$5,801
JamesWhat is quantum leap ♥ happy birthday Booger
$38,314
a quantum leap')

tr.td: PHYSICS TERMS

Ariana

3rd place: $1,000
2nd place: $2,000

Ariana

(including 3 DDs),

body.div: The J! Archive is created by fans, for fans. The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law.
